TextView.android:text: AuToggle is a Android application that is location based.It will allow user's smartphone to Automatically switch between Mute,Vibrate and Ringer mode.The condition will be triggered when the phone enters a specified location.user can enter the Latitude Longitutude to set the location or just use track me feature.The aim is to provide further simplicity to people's life by automatically toggling profiles areas.For e.g.Hospitals,Schools,Office,Home,etc.
